div.p:
Curia balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxvij die Junij
Anno quo supra

The said day Johne of Cullane forspekar for Johne andirsone sone tile
vmquhile Johne andirson of petfour present for the tyme

Eodem die Compertum fuit per Inquisicione Curie quod Agnes crafurd
est legittima filia et heres quondam Richardj craufurd alias Kuwttill pater

The saide day Jonhne blak lauchfullie warnit callit and nocht comperit
to ansuer to the borghe fundin one him be John Jonet litstar for the
wranguis' occupacioun' and Intrometting of the fischingis of half the
thridpart of ane nethis of the pott tharfor the aldirman and balyeis ordanit
Androw nachtj Officiar' to pas' and tak ane Stres' fra the saide Johne
and latt It Agan to borghe' and it be askit and warne him to Comper
this day xv dais the xj day of

The said' day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Johne Cullan
forspekar that Johne fechat hede wrangit in the occupeing of the boit
sallit be him to William tynglatir Skippar of the feir' and the saide
Jonhne sale nocht occupy hir' in tym' to Cum Ande the saide Johne
Sale deliuer the said' boit in the wer' with the gratht pertening
to hir now In the tyme of the pasagis of mavnys Schip
for the quhilkis the saide William sal fynde Souerte her to
pay to the saide Johne xij crovnis Scottis iiijor s' g' for Ilkan
crovne within ane day eftir Scho cum to the port of the wer'
one the saide Johnez Aventour

Curia balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem primo
die mensis Julij Anno quo supra

The said day Johne fechat grantit him awand to Williame
tyngyheatir schipper xxiiij s' of siluere ane franche crowne for ane
barrell of Ter and v s' for a barrell of Appillis quhilkis the ballies
chargit him to pay within thre tydys

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
quarto die mensis Julij anno quo supra

The said day the Alderman and baillies assignit this day xv
dais to Dauid mar younger tile ansuer to the bill gevin In one
him be the Relict of vmquhile Dauid Club of certane gudis quhilkis
scho allegis he tuk out of hir hous' and decernit the copy of the said
bill to the said Dauid one his expens'

The saide day Jonhne fechat grantit him aving to Williame
tingatir liij s' and viij d' Scottis money for the tua part of
the gret seill that he sellit of the hollandir Schip that brek
at croudane to be pait within terme of law

div.head: Nomina ad Inquisicionem Andree burnat
div.p:
Eodem die Alexander rede Andreas Cullane Willelmus blinsele patricius
Rede Willelmus murray Duncanus craik patricius chernsid' alexander
King Johannes Duncansone Johannes murray Allanus lister' Andreas
lousone Alexander prat cristinus prat et Andreas Sratone burgenses dicti
burgi Jurati dicunt quod quondam dominus Andreas henrison' capellanus
auunculus Andree burnat latoris presencium Obiit vltra vestitus et sasitus vt de
feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis de quadam terra Jacente infra
dictum burgum in vico furcarum ex orientali parte eiusdem vici inter terram Willelmi
nicholson ex australi ex vna et terram Johannis Cullan ex boreali partibus ab altera
et communionem viam regiam versus occidens et terram versus
vnus de legitimis oriens Et quod dictus Andreas est legittimus et propinquioribus heredibus dicte quondam
dominj Andree auunculi suj suj de dicta terra et pertinenciis Et quod est legittime etatis
Et quod dicta terra valet nunc per annum xiij s' et iiij d' et valuit x s'
tempore pacis Et quod tenetur in capite de domino nostro Rege per seruicium
burgagium Et nunc existit In manibus domini nostri per mortem dicti domini Andree Regis per Spacium xl die
aut eocirca In defectu viri heredis Jus suum huiusque minime prosequentis

Curia balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem octauo die
Julij anno quo supra

The said day It was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' Williame blinsele
forspekar that Johnne fechat sal deliuer to the Relict of vmquhile
thome leche fattis elding and ale vthir gudis that scho cane preve that the said Johne
Intromettit with And thaj fand that scho had pait x s' v s' of the witsonday
maile with protestacioun' that scho haue na skatht tharof gif It be fundin
be the Counsale of the said townn' that thai aucht nocht to pay the hald yeris
maile in the wyntir tyme that the hous' was on' occupeit for the seknes

Curia balliuorum de Aberdeine de Aberdenn' tenta in pretorio
eiusdem vndecimo die Julij Anno quo supra

The said day Johne blak lauchfully callit warnit and nocht comperit
to ansuer to the borgh' strekit one him be Jonet litster for the wrangwis'
occupacioun' and Intrometting of the fisching of half the thridpart of ane
netht of the pott tharfor the aldirman and ballies ordanit Androw nachtj officiar
to pas' and tak ane stres' fra the said Johne and lat It to borgh' agane
gif It be askit and warne him to Comper one friday cum xv
dais the antepennult day of Julij Instant as

The saide day It was the borgh fundin
Johnesone be Androw low for the wrangwis'
grotis was fundin of nayn avale be ane
forspekar and thai quyt of his challance

The saide day Androw smytht pait to William
behalf quhilkis scho lent him of the quhilk he

The saide day the borghe' fundin apon' Jhone arthour be Androw low was
fundin of vall for his avne part of viij Inglis grotis ymang viij
personis et cetera

The said day It was deliuerit be the aldirman and consale present for the tyme for the
offence and strublance done be androw gordone to the prior carmelitis of aberdeine
and Williame scrimgeour officiar that he sal ask the aldirman ballies and counsale
the said prior and Williame forgevnes et cetera And sale pay to gilbert Riburne' for the
reparacioun' of our lady werk of the said place viij s' And iiij s' to the ballies
and a li' of wax to the haly blud licht And gif euere the said androw committis ony offence
to the said prior or ony vthiris within the said burgh' and beis conuict' tharof sal pay
x markis to sanct nicholace werk vnforgevin be consent of baitht the said
partiis thai beand oblist and suorne tharto

The said day It was deliuerit be and ordanit be the aldirman and the Counsale
present for the tyme for offens' done betuix Johne' steuinsone one that ane part
and Johne annand one that vthir part Ilkane tile vthiris the said Johne' steuinson'
sal pay iiij s' and the said Johne' annand xl d' to the denys of the gild

head.add: plegius legalis inter steuinson' et annand'

div.p:
Eodem die Duncanus Crak deuenit plegius legalis per manus sue dextere
ostendum quod Johannes annand' erit Indempnes pro Johanne steuinson' aliter
quam per viam Juris Et alexandro Red deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus Johannes
steuinson' erit Indempnes pro dicto Johanne annand' aliter quam per viam
Juris Et dicte partes obligantur ad conseruandum plegios suos Indempnes
de huismodi fideiussione

The said day the aldirmane balyeis and counsale for the commone profit of the
Set thar' landis of the tullouche with thar' pertinence
thomas leslie equaly betuix thame for ale the
yeris maile fre for the Inhabitacioun'
nyne Ande ordanit ane Sufficient letter of tak
apone vndir thar commone Seile to giddir with
chesit thar commissaris Alexander menyeis Robert
blinsele Alexander Red' Dauid menyeis Johne of Cullane and Alexander of chamer

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio burgi
de abirdene xviij die Julij anno quo supra

The saide day Androw litster grantit that he hede resauit
fra ane seruitor of gayfor' poppe portar of brugis in lentrin
last bigan ane mass' of lettres directit fra mastir James
merchinstone to Dauy Kintor or gilbert menyeis pertening
to mastir thomas haukerstone and to dene Johne Spendluff
et cetera quhilkis he lest throw negligence with the wif of clay
spyne portar of the ca Wer' for the quhilkis he sal ansuer'
to the partiis quhome it efferis According to Justice

The said day Alexander Watsone in amerciament of the Court ane suorne
assis' Williame blinseill forspekar for the breking of commone ordinance in the
selling of wittaile or It was present to the kingis markat

The said day Waltir souffray grantit him awand
tua franche crownis of gold To be pait the
nixt hereftir follouing and the tothir franche crown
thareftir quhilkis he oblist him be the faitht of
Cullan and gilbert menyeis

Eodem die Willelmus loremar conuictus fuit per assisam Juratam ex ore
Willelmum blinseil prelocutorem eiusdem pro preturbio thome gardane
cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt

Eodem die Walterus saiffray conuictus fuit per dictam assisam
pro perturbio Thome Straloche cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt

The said day William lard come souerte be his hand and gudis to
entir Williame Werty befor the aldirman and baillies one tuysday the
secund day of august to ansuer' to Ellene Wawanez' borgh'
for the wrangwis' withhaldin fra hir of x s' of lent siluer

Eodem die Johannes Thomsone deuenit plegius legalis per
mamus sue dextre ostendem quod Thomas straloche erit Indempnes pro
Waltero saiffray aliter quam per viam Juris Et patricius lesly
Junior deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus Walterus saiffray erit
Indempnes pro dicto thome straloche aliter quam per viam Juris
Et dicte partes obligantur ad conseruandum plegios suos Indempnes
pro huiusmodi fideiussione

The said day Alexander Watsone in auchquhorty in amerciament
of the court for the strublance of Dauid mar baillie in the court
In presence of the aldirman and baillies and tile amend as law will
and forber In tyme tocum And atour the assis' ordanit the said
alexander to ask the said baillie forgevnez one his kneis and gif
euere he commitis ony siclik falt agane and beis conuict tharof sal pay
x s' to sanct nicholes werk vnforgevin
burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxj die Julij

ane frendracht was conuict be ane Suorne assis
for strubulance of mariory Wellis et cetera And atour it was
de assis' that the said cristiane sal Remoiwe out of
ais And gif euer scho offendis to the said mariory and beis
ay xl s' to Sanct nicholes werk vnforgevin
et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxvjo
die Julij anno quo Supra

The saide day Androw Cullane grantit him avand' to Johne scherale
for xiiijor eln' and demi of Rede say and xj eln' of blak say to be pait
in woll salmond' or hidis eftir the tenor of his hande writ
quhilkis the balyeis chargit him to pay within terme of law

Eodem die Willelmus Wormet deuenit plegius legalis quod Jacobus Colison' erit
Indempnis pro Adam Cullane aliter quam per viam Juris per manus dextere
ostendem Et Duncanus Colison deuenit plegius legalis per manus sue ostendem
quod dictus Andreas Jacobus erit Indempnis pro dicto Andrea aliter quam per viam Juris

The said' day Johne Scheuille grantit him aving to Androw
Cullan fiwe eln' of clatht that is in his cloik x s' of Siluer
and J cow hid' quhilkis the ballyeis chargit him to par within terme
of law

Eodem die Johannes Scheual gallicus fecit constituit creauit et ordinauit
Jacobum Colisone suum legittimam procuratorem ad prosequendum suam obligacionem
sibi per Andreasm Cullan factum de et super solucione xiiij vlnarum et dimidium Rubej
say chamber' et xj vlnarum nigri le say Agendum prosequendum defendendum
promittens de Rato et grato cum ceteris terminis necessariis et oportunis

The saide day Androw Cullane tuk to preiwe the xxvij day of
July Instant befor the balyeis in the Court that Johne scheuale was
avand' to him v eln' et demi of clatht and j franche crovne

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxvijo
die Julij quo supra

The saide day the court wardit schew for law and It was gevin for
dome that Androw Cullane falyet in his preiwe Anent the v eln' and demi
of clatht and j franche crovne that he tuk to preif Jhon' scheval
aving to him

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxviij die
Julij anno quo Supra

The saide day Johne Scheuale franchman grantit him pait of
xvij stanez' of woll that was aving to him be Androw Cullan
Eodem die thomas gerdan' Amerciatur per confessione' propre lingue pro perturbio

The said' day Dauid Colp tutor to Isabell buchane protestit that nay'
officiar' suld' pas' with the freris predictoris to distrenye the lande
of the said' Isabell sene thai war' nocht in possession' of nayn'
annuell Rentis tharof / And' atour he maid' William Colp his fadir procurator
in the said' Action' to do follow and defend'

The said the Aldirman and baillies causit gilbert menyeis and Androw Cullane denis
of the gild to pay v markis of the malis of Rubislaw to help to pay the wattir
malis of the furdis that is formalit to the frething of the towne

Eodem die Johannes blak fecit constituit creauit et nominauit Alexandrum Red'
et Johannem mydiltone coniunctim et diuisim cum potestate substituendum ad Respondendum
plegium super ipsum porrectum per Jonetam litster penes quandam partem piscarie
de Pot prout in srtis Curie continetur agendum defendendum et cetera Promittens de
Rato et grato in vberiore forma procuratorij cum ceteris clausulis necessariis

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
xxix die Julij anno quo supra

Dauid menyis Johannes Cullan Alexander Rede Andreas Cullane Andreas
murray Willelmus blinsele thomas Waus patricius leslie Dauid
murray Willelmus Andirsone Willelmus colp Johannes moir' Johannes Arthour'
Richardus Waus et patricius chernsid' burgenses dicti burgi Jurati
dicunt quod quondam dominus Andreas hendirsone capellanus frater mariote hendirson'
latricis presencium obiit vltra vestitus et sasitus ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem
domini nostri Regis de quadam terra Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico furcarum
ex orientali parte eiusdem vici inter terram Willelmi nicholson' ex australi ex vna
et terram Johannis Cullane ex boreali partibus ab altera et Communionem viam regiam versus
occidens et terram versus oriens Et quod dicta mariota est
vna de legittimis et propinquioribus dicte quondam domine Andree fratris suj de dicta terra cum pertinenciis
Et quod est legittime etatis Et quod dicta terra valet nunc per annuum xij s' iiij d'
et valuit x s' tempore pacis Et quod tenetur In capite
de domino nostro Rege per seruicium burgagium Et inter
existit In manibus domini nostri regis per mortem dicte quondam dominj
Andree per Spacium nonem ebdomitarum aut eocirca In defectu
viri heredis Jus suum huiusque minime prosequentis

The saide day gilbert litster deponit be his aitht In presence of Williame
tynyheatir that the pip of wad sauld tile him be Johne Duncansone quhilkis
he bocht fra hew mertesone was war xxxtj s' scottis thane viij li' g'

The said day the baillies assignit this day day xv dais the xij day
of august to Dauid theman and his wif to ansuer to the borgh' strekit one
thame be Johne of Cullane for the wrang Instrometting and withhaldin fra
him of a siluer pece of xiii vnce

The said day the ballies assignit friday the xij day of august nixt
tocum to Johne of Ratre to ansuer to the borgh' strekit one him be georg'
bisset for the wrangwis' withhaldin fra him of a barrell of salmond
and decernit the copy of the borgh' to the said Johne one his expens'

Eodem die Walterus howysone deuenit plegius matheum branche
plegium legalem pro eo quod Johannes Waus erit Indempnes pro eo
aliter quam per viam Juris Et dictus Johannes Waus Inuenit
thomam Waus plegium legalem pro eo quod dictus Walterus erit Indempnes
pro aliter quam per viam Juris Et dicte partes obligantur ad conseruandum
plegios suos Indempnes de huiusmodi fideiussione

Eodem die thomas meldrum nomine vxoris per asisam Juratam
annuatim ex ore Dauid menyeis prelocutorem eiusdem pro perturbio cristine
famule alexandri King cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt

Eodem die thomas myllar anerciatur per dictum assisam per perturbio
thome Robertsone pistorum Et Idem Robertus amerciatur pro perturbio
dictj thome Et vxor dictj thome myllar amerciatur pro perturbio dicti
thome Robertsone Et cuilibet alterj emendabunt ut Jura volunt

Eodem die thomas meldrum Inuenit patricium lesly plegium legalem quod
Cristina strathachin famula alexandri King erit Indempnes pro vxore
sua se et prolibet suis aliter quam per viam Juris

The said day Thomas' Coupland in Anchry oblist him be the faitht of
his body to entir befor the baillies in the tolbutht of Aberdene one
Wedinsday the xvj day of august nixt tocum in the hour of caus
thar tile ansuer and vndirly the law in ale thingis that Williame andirson'
burges of the said burgh has to say tile him And gif he enteris nocht
the said day he oblist him be the faitht of his body to pay xltj s' to
sanct nicholes werk vnforgevin And the said William sal haue pre
uileg to follow ale thingis that the said Johne is awand him befor quhat
Jugis It ples' him and batht the said partijs Renuncit the spirituale law
to the said day

The said day Williame Walcar grantit him awande to Johnne
Arthour xvij schillingis quhilkis the Baillies chargit him to pay within
Terme of law

The said day the actioun of strublance movit betuix Johnne Waus
and Waltir howysone was continewit be the assis' Dauid menyeis for
spekar quhile the secund day of August and the said Waltir tuk to preive
the land his that Johne the Waus teddirit his hors' one

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem secundo die
mensis Augustj Anno Domini millesimo quingentesimo secundo

Eodem die Agnes pennyr amerciatur per assisam Juratam ex ore patricij
Red prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio Agnetis traile Et Idem Agnes traile
pro perturbio dicti Agnetis pennyr Et cuilibet alterj emendabunt vt Jura
volunt

The said the baillies chargit Androw nachtie sergeand to charg' Waltir houyson'
to pay xxtj s' or he passit furtht of the tolbutht to thomas lesly baillie
for his taxt that he was set to

Eodem die thomas Scot amerciatur per assisam Juratam ex ore patricij
Red prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio Johannis Ord Et Idem Johannes ord
pro perturbio dictj thome Scot Et cuilibet alterj emendabunt vt Jura volunt

The saide day the the baillies Chargit Charlis Steuinsone Smitht
to pay to schir thomas lamyntone eftir this viij dais be Runnyne
that he may wyrk Ilkane owk sex pennis quhile he be pait for the
bellies that he has quhilk was sauld to him be thome thomson'
and the pament tharof assignit be the said thomas to the saide ser thomas
lammynton' And failyeing tharof that he pay nocht sex d' Ilkan ouk
as said Is the said ser thomas sale haue the belleis he giffand
the money that he Ressauit fra the said charlis to him agane
